globalAttributes.name: sprig
globalAttributes.description:
Adding the sprig attribute to an element makes it reactive.
```twig
<input sprig type="text" name="query" value="{{ query }}">
```

globalAttributes.name: s-action
globalAttributes.description:
Sends an action request to the provided controller action. ```twig
``` Most controller actions require that the method be set to `post` and will return a variable called `success` (set to `true` on success, otherwise `false` or undefined) and/or `errors` (set to an array of error messages if defined), however each controller action may return different variables according to its response. ```twig
{% if success is defined and success %} Product added to your cart! {% elseif errors is defined %} {% for error in errors %}

{{ error|first }}

{% endfor %} {% endif %} ```

globalAttributes.name: s-boost
globalAttributes.description: Boosts normal anchors and form tags to use AJAX instead.

globalAttributes.name: s-confirm
globalAttributes.description:
Shows a `confirm()` dialog before issuing a request.

```twig
<button sprig s-confirm="Are you sure you wish to delete this entry?">Delete</button>
```

globalAttributes.name: s-disable
globalAttributes.description:
Disables htmx processing for an element and its children. Useful for prevent malicious scripting attacks when you output untrusted user-generated content that may contain HTML tags (see [htmx security](https://htmx.org/docs/#security)).

```twig
<div s-disable>
    {{ entry.untrustedContent }}
<div>
```

globalAttributes.name: s-disinherit
globalAttributes.description: Allows you to control attribute inheritance.

globalAttributes.name: s-encoding
globalAttributes.description:
Allows you to change the request encoding from the usual `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` to `multipart/form-data`, useful for when you want to support file uploads.

```twig
<form sprig s-method="post" s-action="entries/save-entry" s-encoding="multipart/form-data">
```

globalAttributes.name: s-ext
globalAttributes.description: Enables an htmx extension for an element and all its children.

globalAttributes.name: s-headers
globalAttributes.description: Allows you to add to the headers that will be submitted with an AJAX request.

globalAttributes.name: s-history
globalAttributes.description: Allows you to prevent sensitive data being saved to the localStorage cache when taking a snapshot of the page state.

globalAttributes.name: s-history-elt
globalAttributes.description: Allows you to specify the element that will be used to snapshot and restore page state during navigation.

globalAttributes.name: s-include
globalAttributes.description: Includes additional element values in AJAX requests.

globalAttributes.name: s-indicator
globalAttributes.description: The element to put the `htmx-request` class on during the AJAX request.

globalAttributes.name: s-listen
s-method
globalAttributes.description:
Forces the request to be of the type provided. Possible values are `get` (default) or `post`. If set to `post`, Sprig automatically sends a CSRF token in the request.

```twig
<form sprig s-method="post">
```

globalAttributes.name: s-on
globalAttributes.description:
Allows you to respond to events directly on an element. ```twig
Click
```

globalAttributes.name: s-params
globalAttributes.description: Filters the parameters that will be submitted with a request.

globalAttributes.name: s-preserve
globalAttributes.description:
Ensures that an element remains unchanged even when the component is re-rendered. The value should be set to `true` and the element *must* have an `id`.

```twig
<iframe id="video" s-preserve="true"></iframe>
```

globalAttributes.name: s-prompt
globalAttributes.description:
Shows a prompt before submitting a request.

```twig
<button sprig s-prompt="Enter “delete” to confirm deletion.">Delete</button>
```

globalAttributes.name: s-push-url
globalAttributes.description: Pushes a URL into the URL bar and creates a new history entry.

globalAttributes.name: s-replace
globalAttributes.description:
Specifies the element to be replaced. The entire component is returned in the response, but only the specified element is replaced. This is equivalent to combining `s-select`, `s-target` and `s-swap`.

```twig
<input name="query" sprig s-replace="#results">

{# Equivalent to: #}
<input name="query" sprig s-select="#results" s-target="#results" s-swap="outerHTML">
```

globalAttributes.name: s-replace-url
globalAttributes.description: Allows you to replace the current URL of the browser location history.

globalAttributes.name: s-request
globalAttributes.description: Allows you to configure various aspects of the request.

globalAttributes.name: s-select
globalAttributes.description: Selects a subset of the server response to process.

globalAttributes.name: s-select-oob
globalAttributes.description: Selects one or more elements from a server response to swap in via an “Out of Band” swap.

globalAttributes.name: s-swap
globalAttributes.description:
Controls how the response content is swapped into the DOM (`outerHTML`,  `beforeEnd`, etc.).

```twig
<input name="query" sprig s-swap="outerHTML" s-target="#results">
```

globalAttributes.name: s-swap-oob
globalAttributes.description: Marks content in a response as being “Out of Band”, i.e. swapped somewhere other than the target.

globalAttributes.name: s-sync
globalAttributes.description: Allows you to synchronize AJAX requests between multiple elements.

globalAttributes.name: s-target
globalAttributes.description:
Specifies the target element to be swapped.

```twig
<input name="query" sprig s-target="#results">
```

globalAttributes.name: s-trigger
globalAttributes.description:
Specifies the event that triggers the request.

```twig
<input name="query" sprig s-trigger="keyup changed delay:300ms">
```

globalAttributes.name: s-val
globalAttributes.description:
Provides a more readable way of populating the `s-vals` attribute. Replace the `*` with a lower-case name.

```twig
<button sprig s-val:page="{{ page + 1 }}" s-val:limit="10">Next</button>

{# Equivalent to: #}
<button sprig s-vals="{{ { page: page + 1, limit: 10 }|json_encode }}">Next</button>
```

Since HTML attributes are case-insensitive, the name should always be lower-case and in `kebab-case`. Dashes will be removed and the name will be converted to `camelCase` when the variable becomes available in the template after re-rendering.

```twig
{% set myCustomPage = myCustomPage ?? '' %}

<button sprig s-val:my-custom-page="13">Custom Page</button>
```

globalAttributes.name: s-validate
globalAttributes.description: Forces an element to validate itself before it submits a request. Form elements do this by default, but other elements do not.

globalAttributes.name: s-vals
globalAttributes.description:
Adds to the parameters that will be submitted with the request. The value must be a JSON encoded list of name-value pairs.

```twig
<button sprig s-vals="{{ { page: page + 1, limit: 10 }|json_encode }}">Next</button>
```
